about_the_game:
Spirit Guardians is a pixel-art, roguelike game that blends elements of role-playing, strategy, tower defense, real-time strategy, and shooting. Farming gears, upgrading skills, unlocking new talents…the game offers a continuous journey of empowerment, challenging relentless foes to protect the peace of the Spirit Realm!

Guardian


To safeguard the Spirit Realm, you must repel invading evil spirits and defend the spiritual energy crystals. Utilize traps, activate sigils, cast spells, and fight alongside allies to preserve the last hope.

Endless Powerup


Defeat swarms of enemies, absorb soul orbs, level up, and choose skills. Collect soul stones, unlock talents, and gain permanent enhancements. Spend coins to strengthen your unlocked skills. Only through constant growth can you stand against the onslaught of the evil spirit army.

Gear Up


Defeat elite enemies, open chests, choose the desired gears, and upgrade through synthesis. Dress in equipment according to your combat style to craft the strongest warrior uniquely yours!！

Legion of Evil Spirits


In the Spirit Realm, justice and evil are intertwined. Incarnate as an evil spirit, defeat guardians, corrupt spiritual energy crystals—various gameplay experiences await.

Formidable Foes


Within the legion of evil spirits, powerful individuals exist. You must give your all or face defeat. Death is not the end; you can utilize mysterious powers to resurrect, but miracles come at a cost…

Challenge enemies, collect gears, and upgrade skills in gradually unlocked campaigns, or conquer opponents in the arena to prove you might. Are you ready to delve into the Spirit Realm? Your battle begins now in Spirit Guardians!

short_description: Spirit Guardians is a pixel-art roguelike game. A life-and-death battle is unfolding between light and darkness in the spirit realm. Take on the role of the guardian, continually strengthen yourself, and repel the onslaught of the evil spirit legion. Are you ready to embark on this endless journey?
